title: Who should I buy
body: Hi I'm Eternum and I play on OCE. Since I'm new to the game i was wondering if you guys can give me an insight into the 1st champion i should purchase. Thanks for the help and peace.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
Twisted Fate would help to teach you about map awareness, what lanes are good to ult into.

It all depends on how you like to play and your play style though

Practise with the free rotation champs. See which champion fits your playstyle, usually the one you enjoy the most and do well with. Then after the free rotation, unlock him/her and play the crap out of that champion! You'll find sticking to 1 champion early, will greatly improve your playstyle :)
